meanings.definition: Strongly desiring or lusting after something
meanings.sent1: The confectionery shop displayed a concupiscible array of chocolates.
meanings.sent2: The romantic movie had a concupiscible effect on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The concupiscible aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the room.
meanings.sent4: The concupiscible sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The concupiscible idea of a beach vacation excited everyone.

meanings.definition: Capable of arousing desire or lust
meanings.sent1: The luxurious silk sheets felt concupiscible against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The seductive perfume had a concupiscible effect on him.
meanings.sent3: The concupiscible dance moves captivated the audience.
meanings.sent4: The concupiscible melody of the song lingered in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The concupiscible painting evoked strong emotions in the viewers.
